caption.p:
STM images of a MoS 2/Au(111) model catalyst and its stability under desulfurization conditions. a Catalyst after preparation in UHV. 16 × 16 nm 2, U bias = −0.3 V, I t = 320 pA. b Clean Au surface imaged in 1 bar CH 3SH at 250 °C, showing the (1 × 1) Au lattice. 6 × 6 nm
2 , U bias = −0.3 V, I t = 550 pA. c MoS 2/Au(111) after 1 day in 1 bar of a 1:9 CH 3SH/H 2 mixture, showing a sulfur overlayer on the Au(111) substrate. 20 × 20 nm
2 , U bias = −0.3 V, I t = 645 pA
